PR Description: NAATOS TB V1 must operate without necessitating additional costs beyond its initial purchase including no capital costs for instrumentation.

NAATOS TB V1 must not exceed cost per test of $5 USD. (Price of individual test is cost of consumables only and amortized capital costs of any instrumentation; after scale-up; ex works [manufacturing costs only, excluding shipping].)
SR Description: The PM shall cost less than $200 EXW at required scale
The SCC shall cost less than $0.80 EXW at required scale
The SPM shall cost less than $200 EXW at required scale
The STC shall cost less than $1.00 EXW at required scale
The TC shall cost less than $3.00 EXW at required scale
